title: Collaborative Instructional Design Workshop for Improving Blended Learning Environments in Creative Arts

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Online Learning Platform Usage Experience and Intermediate-Level Expertise in Creative Arts
context.additional_context: Reflective practice activities focusing on students and instructors collaboratively improving aesthetic elements and navigation of VLEs (Virtual Learning Environments)

learning_goals: Learners can explain the collaborative design process for improving VLE user experience (UX) with over 80% accuracy
Learners can propose three or more guidelines for developing VLE content tailored to the characteristics of creative arts fields
Learners can produce self-assessment results demonstrating a 20% or greater improvement in confidence in using digital tools
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
